column1: This is a list of postcode districts in the United Kingdom and Crown dependencies. A group of postcode districts with the same alphabetical prefix is called a postcode area. All
column3: of one or more postcode districts are grouped into post towns.Until 1996
column4: Royal Mail required counties to be included in addresses
column5: except for 110 of the larger post towns. For these "special post towns"
column6: the former postal county is shown in brackets below. Since 1996
column7: counties are not required for any address.

column1: Postcode district codes are also known as "outward codes".
^shared  Postcode district shared between post towns
^not  Not part of the United Kingdom and separate postal authorities
List of postcode areas in the United Kingdom
